lead_paragraph: The soprano performed a powerful program at the Metropolitan Opera that focused on the Underground Railroad, and rewarded the audience with five encores.

headline.print_headline: After 22 Years and Bad Feelings, a Warm Embrace
headline.main: Review: Kathleen Battle Returns to the Met After 22 Years. It Was Worth the Wait.

snippet: The soprano performed a powerful program at the Metropolitan Opera that focused on the Underground Railroad, and rewarded the audience with five encores....
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews performance by soprano Kathleen Battle, accompanied by choir Voices of the Underground Railroad, at Metropolitan Opera.
